author: Bellular News
description:
Use code BELLULARNEWS at the link below to get an exclusive 60% off an annual Incogni plan: https://incogni.com/bellularnews Sponsored by Incogni.

From 10 million to 160,000 in 6 months. Monster Hunter Wilds' sales have cratered so badly that even a 6 year old Devil May Cry remaster is beating it. 

Join us at http://bellular.games for early access content, 20 editions of 'Loading Screen' a month and to support our team!

00:00  From 10M to 160K: The Collapse
02:11  Devil May Cry 5 Is Outselling Wilds
03:12  Why Capcom Isn't Panicking (Yet)
05:03  Players Are Playing, Not Buying
07:23  The Industry Broke
09:16  No Good Options

Sources:
https://www.capcom.co.jp/ir/english/news/html/e250331.html

title: Monster Hunter Wilds Sales Collapsed 98%, Even Rise Is Crushing It
